text:
January 28, 1957
Mr. Irving Merrill
Station WKAR-TV
Michigan State University
East Lansing, Michigan
Dear Irv:
I think that if you don't already know, you soon will, that you're on the NAE3
Research Conrdttee.
That being the case, as if I hadn't imposed on you before, could you do a Fact-
Sheet Digest of the attached within the next couple of weeks? I'm on the road
again, and have been instructed to farm these out to Research Committee members,
selected for this among other abilities, on as fair a basis as possible.
Our best, Irv. Hope you can swing even a brief one.
* Sincerely,
Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
HJSidfc
Enclosed: Case Institute Closed Circuit TV reports of
December 13, 1956 and August 3, 1956.
